S:log-item.D:comment:
DERBY-4319 hang in suites.all with ibm 1.5 on AIX after ttestDefaultProperties
disable for now ttestDefaultProperties and ttestSetPortPriority on AIX IBM 1.5, which can make the test fail. This does not fix the issue. Also add BaseTestCase.isPlatform(String) method and OsName class to faciltate platform exclusions from test runs.
